definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: But the hot days of summer had dried up all the mountain brooks.
sentences.chinese: 可是夏季的炎热天气已经把所有的山涧小溪都晒干了。

sentences.english: Emotional and transparent image of mountain streams uncontaminated streams, lively and smooth.
sentences.chinese: 情绪透明的的像山涧中未经污染的小溪，欢快而流畅。

sentences.english: Maybe water from a mountain stream.
In the lower reaches of the mountain river, Himalayan mahseer are gathering.
sentences.chinese: 在山涧河流的下游，喜玛拉雅马西亚鱼正在聚集。

sentences.english: A clear mountain stream flows steadily through a rocky defile.
sentences.chinese: 一股清澈的山涧平稳的流过嶙峋的峡谷。

sentences.english: A mountain stream pours into the rivers.
Wash down Dramamine , sink into the rocking diesel, the asphalt road through the hills.
sentences.chinese: 洗下来芬尼，陷入摇动柴油，沥青路面，通过山涧。

sentences.english: Creek waterfall splashed Jiu birds sing.
sentences.chinese: 山涧瀑布飞溅，百鸟啾鸣。

sentences.english: Do you see any mountain stream around here?

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
